articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Ukraine attacks Russian navy base near Novorossiysk - Reuters
articles.description: Ukrainian sea drones attacked a Russian navy base near the Black Sea port of Novorossiysk, a major hub for Russian exports, early on Friday and were destroyed by Russian warships, Russia's defence ministry said.

articles.title: Amazon’s stock surges as Q2 earnings show profit and sales jump - CNN
articles.description: E-commerce behemoth Amazon increased its net sales 11% to $134.4 billion in the second quarter as analysts monitor consumer spending in both the cloud and retail markets.
